title: The US is sanctioning Chinese officials over alleged abuse of Uyghurs in Xinjiang. Here's what you need to know
content:
1. The US is sanctioning Chinese officials over alleged abuse of Uyghurs in Xinjiang. Here's what you need to know  CNN
  2. Faced with sanctions and condemnation from the West, China becomes bedfellows with Russia  The Washington Post
  3. Xinjiang sanctions are sign of western resolve on China  Financial Times
  4. Mutually destructive sanctions will help no one  South China Morning Post
  5. The US’ push for allied sanctions on China edges us closer to a new Cold War, but Biden mustn’t bank on long-term European support  RT
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
The US is sanctioning Chinese officials over alleged abuse of Uyghurs in Xinjiang. Here's what you need to know  CNN
Faced with sanctions and condemnation from the West, China becomes bedfellows with Russia  The Washington Post
Xinjiang sanctions are sign of western resolve on China  Financial Times
Mutually destructive sanctions will help no one  South China Morning Post
The US’ push for allied sanctions on China edges us closer to a new Cold War, but Biden mustn’t bank on long-term European support  RT
